Name: Customer Support Chatbot
Description: AI-powered chatbot for customer support queries
Purpose: Provide 24/7 customer support through natural language conversations
Data Inputs: Customer queries, chat history, product documentation
Training Data Sources: Customer support tickets; Product manuals; FAQ database

Name: Fraud Detection System
Description: ML model for detecting fraudulent transactions
Purpose: Identify and flag potentially fraudulent financial transactions in real-time
Data Inputs: Transaction data, user behavior patterns, historical fraud cases
Training Data Sources: Historical transaction data; Known fraud cases; User profiles

Name: Document Processing RPA
Description: Robotic process automation for invoice processing
Purpose: Automate extraction of data from invoices and receipts
